text: Stará Ľubovňa (; ; ) is a town in the Prešov Region in northeastern Slovakia. About 16,000 people live there. It has two districts: Podsadek and Stará Ľubovňa. The town was first mentioned as Libenow in 1292. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in Slovakia Category:Prešov Region
title: Stará Ľubovňa
